thread.section_title: ALittleLuxury.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ALittleLuxury.com.au | alittleluxury.com.au
thread.title: Lisa A

author: Lisa A
title: Lisa A
text: This is the second time i have used A Little Luxury for a hamper as a gift and once again I'm really happy with the service and the quality of the goods. A Little Luxury is one of the few places that allow changes to the selected hamper so that it can really be tailored for the recipient. I will definitely use A Little Luxury again and i have no hesitation in recommending them as well.
